message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this remarkable item at a special price tailored to make it more accessible to you. My proposal is to extend the offer at $950,000. This represents an exceptional saving compared to its true worth and is a chance not to be missed. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
